name: telcoinwiki
description: Build tooling and quality checks for the Telcoin Wiki static site

scripts.build:js: mkdir -p dist && terser js/main.js -o dist/main.js --compress --mangle && terser js/faq.js -o dist/faq.js --compress --mangle && terser js/pools-data.js -o dist/pools.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:img
